name: Variable assignment
prompt:
Add a public function called Accumulate to Calculator.calr that demonstrates mutable variable assignment. It takes i32 parameter n and returns i32. Initialize an accumulator to 0, then add n to it three times.

Use this exact Calor variable assignment syntax:
§F{f003:Accumulate:pub}
  §I{i32:n}
  §O{i32}
  §B{acc} 0
  §ASSIGN acc (+ acc n)
  §ASSIGN acc (+ acc n)
  §ASSIGN acc (+ acc n)
  §R acc
§/F{f003}

The §ASSIGN name expression syntax assigns to a mutable variable:
- name must have been declared with §B first
- expression is evaluated and assigned
- Enables imperative programming patterns when needed
